FUNCTION count_bits(x) RESULT(cnt)
  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: x
  INTEGER :: cnt, i
  cnt = 0
  DO i = 0, 31
    IF (BTEST(x, i)) THEN
      cnt = cnt + 1
    END IF
  END DO
END FUNCTION count_bits

PROGRAM sequence
  IMPLICIT NONE
  INTEGER :: n, x, a(0:32), first_result, total, MODULUS = 2019
  CHARACTER(LEN=20) :: s_first, s_second
  INTEGER :: N_second, ans_second, len_third
  INTEGER, ALLOCATABLE :: mod_arr(:)
  INTEGER :: mod_cnt(0:MODULUS-1), radix, tmp, pos, digit
  CHARACTER(LEN=100) :: result_third
  INTEGER :: i

  ! First part
  READ *, n
  a = 0 DO i = 1, n
    READ *, x
    a(count_bits(x)) = a(count_bits(x)) + 1
  END DO

  total = 0
  DO i = 0, 32
    total = total + (a(i) * (a(i) - 1)) / 2
  END DO
  first_result = total

  ! Convert first_result to string s_first
  WRITE(s_first, '(I0)') first_result
  s_first = ADJUSTL(s_first)

  ! Second part
  N_second = LEN_TRIM(s_first)
  ALLOCATE(mod_arr(0:N_second-1)) mod_arr = 0
  mod_cnt = 0
  radix = 1

  DO i = 0, N_second-1
    pos = N_second - i
    digit = ICHAR(s_first(pos:pos)) - ICHAR('0')
    tmp = MOD(digit * radix, MODULUS) IF (i > 0) THEN
      tmp = MOD(tmp + mod_arr(i-1), MODULUS)
    END IF
